tasks.label: Clean build + HTMLProofer (internal)
tasks.command:
set -e
if ! bundle check > /dev/null 2>&1; then bundle config set --local path 'vendor/bundle'; bundle install --jobs 4; fi
rm -rf _site && bundle exec jekyll build --quiet && bundle exec htmlproofer ./_site --root-dir ./_site --check-html --allow-missing-href --disable-external

tasks.label: Jekyll clean prod build (tee log)
tasks.command:
set -e
mkdir -p Logs Logs/htmlproofer
rm -rf _site
if ! bundle check > /dev/null 2>&1; then bundle config set --local path 'vendor/bundle'; bundle install --jobs 4; fi
JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --trace | tee Logs/build-latest.txt
